string.name: info
string.p: This android based application will provide 4 different Topics(C++,JAVA,SQL and HTML). On the bases of the Topic Selected one can easily generate the question paper. User can create the question paper of 10 questions at maximum. The pdf created can be found in the my files or file explorer of the respective device.
